precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The 'Control Panel' window will open and come into focus.

precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The Windows XP Start Menu will open.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open.
expected_results: The "Control Panel" option in the Start Menu will become highlighted.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is displayed in Classic View.
expected_results: No visible change will occur in the Control Panel interface.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open.
expected_results: The 'Control Panel' item on the Windows taskbar will become highlighted.

precondition: The Control Panel is open in Classic View. The 'Add or Remove Programs' icon is highlighted.
action: Press the 'P' key, followed by the 'O' key.
expected_results: The 'Add or Remove Programs' icon will no longer be highlighted, and the mouse cursor will move to the 'Power Options' icon.

precondition: The "Power Options" icon in the Control Panel is selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu is set to "After 20 mins."
action: Click the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu and select "After 1 min."
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu will update to display "After 1 min."

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open. The 'Power Schemes' tab is active and the 'Home/Office Desk' power scheme is selected. The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the 'After 20 mins' option in the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu will close. The 'Turn off monitor' setting for the 'Home/Office Desk' power scheme will be set to 'After 20 mins'.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected. The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu is set to your desired value (e.g., "After 1 minute").
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The "Turn off monitor" setting for the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme will be updated to the selected value.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open, displaying system configuration options in the Classic View.
action: Double Click the icon labeled "Display Properties".
expected_results: The "Control Panel" window will be replaced by the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
expected_results: The screen saver preview window will disappear.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will expand to show a list of screen saver options. The 'None' option will be automatically selected, and the 'Settings' button will become disabled.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu is open, and "None" is highlighted.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, the "Wait:" field will display "10", and "None" will be selected as the screen saver.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'OK' button is highlighted.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' window will close. The changes made to the screen saver settings, specifically setting it to '(None)', will be applied.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and in Classic View.
expected_results: The Power Options Properties dialog box will open.
